item.description:
I am the chairman of the Manchester dog park association. We have been given a piece of land at Bass Island, on the west side of Manchester. We are looking for Volunteers for our committee and we are looking for donations. Please check us out at Manchesterdogparg.org Read about us and if you feel so inclined to help this park move forward please click on the icon to make a contribution, this is a paypal account so your transaction is 100% safe. This will be a park where all dogs are welcome. We are also in the planning stage of our second site along the Merrimack river right in front of the new Elliot Hospital. Below queen city ave off of Sundial Ave. Any questions please email me at matt.j.swank@gmail.com. your feedback and help are most welcome.
The next meeting for volunteers is at my home on May 3rd 7:00 PM. Please email me for my address.
FYI we already have one volunteer from our pug group. So please join us and help us get Manchester's dog parks up and running!!!

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Manchester Dog Park, Volunteer Meeting...
